name: Sushi7 Japanese Restaurant
text:
Lunch Menu
Appetiser
Edamame — 7.95
Miso Soup — 7.95
House Wonton Soup — 8.95
Pan-Fried Dumplings (5pcs) — 9.95
Mixed Veg Tempura — 12.95 (3pcs of yam tempura, 3pcs of mushroom tempura, 3pcs broccoli tempura)
Mixed Steamed Dim Sum (9pcs) — 14.95 (3pcs of shumai, 3pcs of shrimp dumplings, 3pcs of custard bun)
Deluxe Tempura — 14.95 (3pcs of shrimp tempura, 3pcs of yam tempura, 3pcs of mushroom tempura)
Japanese Style Veg Potato Croquettes (2pcs) — 8.95 (Mixed veg with mashed potato, rolling it in wheat flour, eggs, deep-fried with breadcrumbs)
Ramen & Donburi
Tonkotsu Ramen — 23.95 (Pork belly chashu, marinated soft boiled egg, bean sprout, green onion, thin wavy noodles, sesame, nori)
Tonkotsu Black Ramen — 23.95 (Black garlic oil, pork belly chashu, marinated soft boiled egg, bean sprout, green onion, thin wavy noodles, sesame, nori)
Japanese Gyu Don + Miso Soup — 23.95 (Rice with shredded beef, egg, caramelised onions, green onion, sesame, nori)
Japanese Karaage Don + Miso Soup — 23.95 (Rice with Japanese fried chicken, seasonal veg, sesame, nori, veg fruit sauce on top)
Seafood Udon Noodle Soup (Seasonal) — 25.95 (House made fish soup base, udon noodles, sea scallop, whole clam, shrimp, fish cake, green onion and 2pcs of tempura shrimp on top)
Sushi Bar Special
Veg Maki Set + Miso Soup — 17.95 (6pcs of AC roll, 6pcs of oshinko roll, 6pcs of cucumber roll)
Classic Maki Set + Miso Soup — 17.95
A (6pcs of California roll, 6pcs of Spicy Dynamite roll)
B (6pcs of Crunch roll, 6pcs of Spicy California roll)
C (6pcs of California roll, 6pcs of Spicy Crab roll)
Nigiri Set + Miso Soup — 19.95 (4pcs of salmon nigiri, 2pcs of shrimp nigiri, 2pcs of red snapper nigiri, 2pcs of octopus nigiri, 2pcs sweet of egg nigiri)
Supreme Salmon Lover Set + Miso Soup — 25.95 (3pcs of salmon sashimi, 3pcs of salmon nigiri, 6pcs of spicy salmon roll)
Sashimi Set + Miso Soup — 26.95 (4pcs of salmon sashimi, 4pcs of saba sashimi, 4pcs sweet egg sashimi, 4pcs bean curd, 2pcs red snapper sashimi, 2pcs of snow crab, 2pcs of tuna)
New Torch Pressed Sushi
Torch Pressed Salmon Sushi (6pcs) — 15.95
Torch Pressed Eel Sushi (6pcs) — 15.95
Torch Pressed Saba Sushi (6pcs) — 15.95
Japanese Handmade Dessert
Japanese Vanilla Crème Brûlée — 6.95
Japanese Matcha Cheesecake with Isuzu Matcha Powder (1 slice) — 8.95
Japanese Black Sesame Cheesecake with Kinako Powder (1 slice) — 8.95
Japanese Handmade Basque Burnt Cheesecake (4-in) — 15.95
